features: 3 FLAT BOXES: Each box of Kleenex Soothing Lotion Facial Tissues with Coconut Oil, Aloe & Vitamin E and contains 120 tissues—packaging may vary from what is shown.
DERMATOLOGIST-TESTED FACIAL TISSUES: Our dermatologist-tested, dye-free and fragrance-free lotion tissue features 3-in-1 skin-loving benefits that help protect, soothe and nourish skin.
3-LAYER FACIAL TISSUE: One Kleenex tissue is all it takes to protect your hands and nourish your skin with 3 thick layers.
GET FACIAL TISSUES DELIVERED: Skip the store and get Kleenex Soothing Lotion Facial Tissues delivered.
FSC-CERTIFIED FACIAL TISSUES: 100% of our pulp is from responsibly managed forests.
body.description: Kleenex Soothing Lotion Facial Tissues feature 3-in-1 skin-loving benefits that help protect hands with 3 thick layers, soothes with dermatologist tested gently touch, and nourishes skin with gentle moisturizers. Whether you need Kleenex tissue boxes for the house or the office, with Kleenex Soothing Lotion Facial Tissues, you get 3 flat boxes of 120 tissues, so you have plenty of tissues for everyone. When you’re not feeling well, the simplest things can matter most—upgrade your cold and flu care or allergy routine with Kleenex Soothing Lotion Facial Tissues. One tissue of Kleenex is all it takes and helps protect hands better with three thick layers during cold and flu season. Plus, our tissues are dye and fragrance free. Find a tissue box that fits your home because each pack contains various colors and designs. 100% of our pulp is from responsibly managed forests.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and Soothing
reviews.reviewText: I have year round allergies which means almost constant blowing and wiping my nose. And now with the winter weather it's worst, my nose is red, sore and irritated. These tissues are super soft and soothing, not at all rough like some I've tried. They arrived well packaged and secure, and the boxes were larger than I thought they would be. I can't attest to the smell as my stuffy nose as no sense of smell at all. I'm quite sure its there I just can't smell anything right now. But I am happy with my purchase. Great value, and I will purchase again. 😊😊

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars what else can I say about Kleenex
reviews.reviewText: In the summer months you get blocked noses runny noses and these are perfect they are much thicker and more durable than regular tissue products on the market and they have lotion so it doesn't start to burn your nose after more and more use, comes in perfect when you're sick and you're always wiping your nose there is no hardness or rash. Kleenex always makes the perfect product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I started using this lotion Kleenex and love the softness and strong tissues. It’s soft on my nose and soothing at the same time. I go through a lot of these because I use them at home and take to my hospital office. Kleenex is an excellent brand I’ve used lifelong.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice tissues for when we were sick
reviews.reviewText: Our household had a sickness and we were blowing and wiping our noses all day and all night. You can tell the difference between tissues that are soft with lotion and those without. Totally worth the purchase

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft to the nose
reviews.reviewText: Love these tissues I had the flu throughout Christmas and I was feeling pretty awful the tissues are so l soft to the nose everything was good had a descent amount in each box and glad it was a three pack because 3 days after the flu was over I caught covid and still i only went through One and half boxes with both infections. And still my nose feels good. So thank you Kleenex this are the most wonderful tissues 💚

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Soft and very durable. Does the job with a sore runny nose. That’s why I bought these. Ply is perfect. Will buy them again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got these by mistake. I usually get tissue without lotion as I don't like how they feel greasy. I was pleasantly surprised at how soft and strong these tissues are, with no greasy feeling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024

reviews.reviewTitle: Say Goodbye to Dry Skin with Kleenex Soothing Lotion Facial Tissues
reviews.reviewText: I recently started using the Kleenex Soothing Lotion Facial Tissues with Coconut Oil, Aloe & Vitamin E and I am blown away by how much they have improved my skin. The tissues are soft and gentle on my skin, while the added coconut oil, aloe, and vitamin E provide extra hydration and nourishment, leaving my skin feeling refreshed and soothed.The 3-ply construction is strong and durable, so I don't have to worry about the tissues falling apart in my hands, and the lotion is evenly distributed, so I get the same benefits with every use. I love the convenience of having a box of tissues in my home, office, and car, making it easy for me to have a soothing and refreshing experience whenever I need it.I highly recommend these Kleenex Soothing Lotion Facial Tissues for anyone looking for a gentle and effective solution for dry skin. Whether you have sensitive skin or just want to pamper yourself, these tissues are sure to exceed your expectations and provide a luxurious experience with every use.
Love the softness of these tissues and the fact that its 3-Ply is what made me buy it. If Kleenex still existed in Canada I would keep buying em’
Great product. I never use any other Kleenex. Soft, thick, and never a red nose when sick when using them.

reviews.reviewTitle: Loved them BUT Price has jumped 50% since I last bought
reviews.reviewText: Good But big price jump will not order at this price

Okay, let's talk about tissues, my friends. I mean, it's not the sexiest topic, but when you've got seasonal allergies or a miserable cold, a good tissue can be a real game-changer. This Kleenex product I've been using lately is a real gem. It's hydrating, it's soft, and it's got vitamins and nutrients up the wazoo. I mean, who knew a tissue could be so fancy? But seriously, if you're sick and you need to blow your nose approximately 45 times an hour (no judgment, we've all been there), do yourself a favor and ditch the sandpaper-grade tissues. Your poor nose will thank you.
